# 40th Army Corps (Russian Empire)

|allegiance = Imperial Russian Army
|battles    = First World War
}}
The 40th Army Corps was an Army corps in the Imperial Russian Army during the First World War.
Part of
*8th Army: 2 October 1915 – 11 September 1916
*Russian Special Army: 15 September 1916 – 22 October 1916
*9th Army: 28 October 1916 – December 1917
